occupation: Software Engineer Intern at Sigma Computing
headline: Actively looking for fulltime opportunities | CS student at Columbia University
summary:
I'm currently a master's student in Computer Science at Columbia University graduating in December 2023. I'm interested in Software Development and Machine Learning, and had previous experience as software engineer intern and machine learning engineer intern.

Coursework: Engineering Software-as-a-Service, Neural Network Deep Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Cloud Computing, Database Systems, Data Structures, Algorithms, Engineering Blockchain and Web3 Apps

Skills:
Languages: C++/C, Python, Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, Spark, SQL, MongoDB, Neo4j, HTML5/CSS
Frameworks and Tools: Hadoop, Google Cloud Platform, Amazon Web Services, ReactJS, Django, Flask, Latex, Git, Jira

experiences.title: Machine Learning Engineer
experiences.description:
- Extracted and selected features of medical images based on radiomics and built classification models for benign and malignant dichotomies of parotid gland tumors and quartation of breast cancer.
-Conducted data analysis and comparison of the performance of artificial and AI diagnosis

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description:
- Developed a preliminary understanding of software development process, using several different architectures, including Spring, Spring Cloud, Mybatis, etc.
- Worked on backend of Google Authenticator to support Senior Development Engineer with a major project designed to support online medical diagnosis.

accomplishment_projects.title: Web Application for Player Rating Services on AWS
accomplishment_projects.description:
- Implemented online services for player rating by multiple AWS services including API Gateway, CloudFront, SNS, etc.
- Designed and constructed both front end and back end which supported google authenticator login
- Developed microservices that implemented REST API for players, users running on EC2, Elastic beanstalk and Docker respectively, connected to SQL database on RDS for query transaction
- Processed comments using lambda function which supports sent subscription confirmation email.

accomplishment_projects.title: Supervised Text Classification
accomplishment_projects.description:
- Used Python and sk-learn to implement classifiers for sentiment analysis and feature analysis.
- Trained a model that has 70% accuracy on sentiment analysis dataset of Tweets from 2013.
